name: LogoGarden
overview:
Helping Cash-Strapped Entrepreneurs For 15 years LogoGarden.com founder John Williams owned an award-winning branding firm that served national and global companies. His firmâ€™s growing fame led many entrepreneurs to seek Johnâ€™s assistance with their branding and Logo Design.

While large, well-funded companies paid John’s firm top fees, he often helped startup businesses and aspiring entrepreneurs at no charge. He provided high quality logo design using logo symbols initially developed for large clients, but which these clients had not selected. By modifying color, lettering style and layout, John found he could provide entrepreneurs with outstanding results at unprecedented speed. Johnâ€™s process â€” analyzed, automated on the Web and expanded to include thousands of logo design symbols â€” gave rise to the first-ever do-it-yourself logo creation website, serving more than 100,000 businesses, organizations and entrepreneurs.

John built on this vast experience to now bring you LogoGarden.com. It reflects his most advanced thinking to deliver enhanced ease of use and more than 10,000 new symbols designed by John himself and his hand-picked team of world-class logo designers.

The result: a remarkably fast and easy LogoGarden logo design process that enables you to create a professional-looking logo in minutes, even if you canâ€™t draw a straight line or feel you canâ€™t even describe what youâ€™re looking for. Simply use keywords and other tools to select your symbol, choose a color and lettering style, tweak your layout and presto! You have a unique, professional branding identity to utilise for years to come.

funding_rounds.source_description: LogoGarden Closes $2 Million Financing From FCA Venture Partners
